price: Isiniif ishee (beyladoota wareegaa) keessa faaydaaleetu jira hanga beellama murtaa’eetti. Sana booda iddoon ishee (bakkiti itti qalamtu) gara Mana turaa (daangaa harama Makkaa)ti.
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى ثُمَّ مَحِلُّهَآ إِلَى ٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡعَتِيقِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā manāfiʿu ilā ajalin musamman thumma maḥilluhā ilā al-bayti al-ʿatīqi
